medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced severe neck pain for the past 3 years. Clinical examination revealed a reduced range of motion and hardening of the splenius capitis muscle on both sides.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has been diagnosed with Dyggve-Melchior-Clausen (DMC) syndrome characterized by short-spine type dwarfism and skeletal abnormalities.
medical_history.family_history: The parents are healthy first cousins. A 19-year-old brother seems to be similarly affected.
